Posts.EditableText:
When i try to install the newer version of quest. it comes up with this error. Do i need to uninstall other version first? i'm worried about losing my files. the error says. An error occurred while trying to replace the existing file: DeleteFile Failed; code 5.
access is denied.
Posts.HTML:
When i try to install the newer version of quest. it comes up with this error. Do i need to uninstall other version first? i'm worried about losing my files. the error says. An error occurred while trying to replace the existing file: DeleteFile Failed; code 5.
access is denied.

Posts.EditableText: Make sure you're not running Quest. Exit Quest and QDK before upgrading. If that doesn't work, try rebooting first.
Posts.HTML: Make sure you're not running Quest. Exit Quest and QDK before upgrading. If that doesn't work, try rebooting first.
